name: The White Laboratory
description: The White Laboratory is a sandbox style physics-based tower defense and RTS game in which you modularly build and command robotic structures. Use them to defend against or conquer other disobedient mechanical blocks on a facility floating in the atmosphere of a remote gas planet.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 1.0 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution 1280x720
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 2.0 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
